name: dev-databases
description: Local database container with ElasticSearch, EventStore, Mongo, MySQL, RabbitMQ, and Redis

scripts.start: echo "Please Select a Migration to Run" && exit 0
scripts.mysql: npx db-migrate up --config migrations\database.json -m migrations\mysql -e dev-mysql
scripts.mysql-down: npx db-migrate reset --config migrations\database.json -m migrations\mysql -e dev-mysql
scripts.mongo: npx db-migrate up --config migrations\database.json -m migrations\mongo -e dev-mongo
scripts.mongo-down: npx db-migrate reset --config migrations\database.json -m migrations\mongo -e dev-mongo
